trans-unit.target: TEXT_DUNGEONDAIMYOYASHIKI_00000_KAGEYAMA_000_000<tab>You've done well to make it this far, but I'm afraid your journey ends here. Come, Yojimbo! We have visitors!
TEXT_DUNGEONDAIMYOYASHIKI_00000_YOJIMBO_000_100<tab>Your coffers appear empty, Kageyama. If you cannot pay my price, then I am finished here.
